attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When fuel was sold in Gallons, price rises where almost invisible, but now we have litres the rises are very noticeable.
The price rise bought in on Monday mean the rise (if worked out in Gallons) is almost 9p per gallon.
What with the Vehicle Excise duty and fuel costs and insurance premiums all rising, the disabled like me and low earners are being "Priced Off The Road" by this governament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
